flawed_nl_solution:
If a bunny comes out of its hole three times in a minute, in an hour, with 60 minutes, the bunny will come out of the hole 60*3=<<60*3=180>>180 times.
In 10 hours, a bunny will come out of their hole 180*10=<<180*10=8100>>8100 times.
The combined time that 20 bunnies coming out of their holes will have taken in 10 hours is 8100*20=<<8100*20=162000>>162000 times.
#### 162000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1800, not 8100. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
